this-was-my-first-purchase-from-this-bra: This was my first purchase from this brand, and I am very happy with my choice. The product exceeded my expectations, being both durable and easy to use. The packaging was neat, and the instructions were clear. Iwill definitely buy again!

best-seller-paragraph: Explore timeless designs crafted with care. From elegant necklaces to charming rings, our jewelry adds beauty. Celebrate special moments with pieces that shine effortlessly.
about-us-paragraph: At Rose, we are dedicated to curating exceptional products that inspire. Our mission is to provide quality, affordability, and unmatched customer satisfaction in every purchase.
about-us-headline: We Provide the Best Quality Gift Boxes for You

shipping-times-paragraph: Orders are processed within 1–2 business days. Delivery times vary based on your location and selected shipping method:
delivery-zones-paragraph: We currently deliver to most regions across:
selected-countries: Selected countries in the Middle East and Asia
delivery-zones-note: If your country is not listed, feel free to contact our support team for availability options.
shipping-fees-note-one: Shipping fees are calculated at checkout based on destination and order weight.
shipping-fees-note-two: Orders over $100 qualify for free standard shipping (domestic only).
shipping-fees-note-three: Customs duties and import taxes (for international orders) are the responsibility of the customer.
missed-delivery-note-one: If a delivery attempt is missed, carriers typically leave a notice or attempt redelivery the next day.
missed-delivery-note-two: Packages returned to us due to incorrect address or non-collection can be reshipped for an additional fee.
missed-delivery-note-three: Contact our support within 7 days to arrange re-shipment or a refund (excluding shipping costs).
terms-rule-one: Users must be at least 18 years old to use our platform.
terms-rule-two: All content, images, and trademarks belong to their respective owners.
terms-rule-three: Unauthorized use of the service is strictly prohibited.
privacy-rule-one: We collect only necessary data to provide and improve our services.
privacy-rule-two: Your personal information is never sold or shared with third parties.
privacy-rule-three: You have the right to request data deletion at any time.
cookies-rule-one: We use cookies to personalize user experience and analyze traffic.
cookies-rule-two: You can disable cookies in your browser settings.
cookies-rule-three: Certain features may not function properly without cookies.
ordering-title: How do I place an order?
ordering-answer: To place an order, simply select the product, add it to your cart, and proceed to checkout. You can choose from various payment options at checkout.
shipping-answer: We offer standard and express shipping options. Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days, and express shipping delivers within 1-2 business days.
payment-title: What payment methods do you accept?
payment-answer: We accept payments via credit/debit cards, PayPal, and Apple Pay.
returns-title: How do I return a product?
returns-answer: You can return unused items within 14 days for a full refund or exchange. Please ensure the product is in its original packaging.
product-title: How do I know if a product is in stock?
product-answer: All product availability is displayed on the product page. If an item is out of stock, you will be notified and can choose to be alerted when it's back in stock.
